verses.roman:
cintāmaṇi-maya bhūmi ratnera bhavana
cintāmaṇi-gaṇa dāsī-caraṇa-bhūṣaṇa

synonyms: cintāmaṇi-maya—made of transcendental touchstone; bhūmi—the ground; ratnera—of gems; bhavana—the original source; cintāmaṇi-gaṇa—such touchstones; dāsī-caraṇa-bhūṣaṇa—foot decorations of the maidservants of Vṛndāvana.
translation: "Vṛndāvana-dhāma is made of transcendental touchstone. Its entire surface is the source of all valuable jewels, and the cintāmaṇi stone is used to decorate the lotus feet of the maidservants of Vṛndāvana.
